system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user ends their activation. If Rainy Weather is present, the user does the Set-Up and resolves Attack on the same activation.

Resolution: On their next activation, they attack with and resolve this Attack.

actions.name: Electro Shot
actions.description:
